Developer Terms of Use
des:
The secret behind Loison’s hand-baked products lies in the quality of the ingredients and the time spent to produce them. We select our ingredients with utmost care to intensify the fragrance of Loison’s pastry; flavours are engraved in memory to recall genuine and ancient ones from the past.

This skill will tell you how Loison bakes its products, listing the prime-quality ingredients it uses and the care it takes in every detail.
If your device has a screen, you will be also able to see a photo of the products, of the ingredients and of the production process. Allow yourself to be amazed by the packaging: each of them is a unique work of art.

After guiding you to the discovery of our Christmas products and telling you about the features of the Christmas sweet you prefer, the skill can send you a discount code with which you can shop directly from the web store on Loison's website.

You will receive the discount code and the instructions via email.
If you did not give e-mail permissions to the skill during activation, don't worry: Alexa’s voice will guide you through the steps required to authorize it.
To use the Loison skill you can say sentences such as:
“Alexa, open italian pastry”
“Alexa, ask italian pastry to tell me about the Panettone”
“Alexa, ask italian pastry to tell me about the Pandoro”
“Alexa, ask italian pastry for a chocolate Panettone”
“Alexa, ask italian pastry for a sweet with cream”
“Alexa, ask italian pastry for biscuits”

If you need help, you can say: "Alexa, ask italian pastry for help"

To learn more about Loison, you can visit the Web site : www.loison.com
If you want to get in touch with us directly, you can mail to: loison@loison.com

Privacy notes: the skill will not store any data on its users. Your e-mail address may be used by the skill only if you explicitly authorize it to do so. User e-mail addresses shall only be employed to send individual discount codes and will not be stored in any database, be it within or outside the skill itself.
